0.3.name: wordpress/paypal-shortcodes
0.3.description:
This plugin allow to insert Paypal buttons in your posts or pages, just using a shortcode. You can define your email and currency in the Settings › Writing admin panel.

[paypal type="add" name="Item Name vol. 1" amount="12.99"]

This shortcode will print the "Add to cart" button: it will add "Item Name vol. 1" (priced 12.99[currency]) in your paypal cart.

[paypal type="view"]

This shortcode will print the "View cart" button.
